name: Big and Little
description:
This 2 Player VR game requires one player in the VR headset, and another on the computer. Work together to figure out how to get to the next room. This was built as part of the AT&T VR Hackathon Feb 26, 2017.

Charles Harris-White
Jami Schwarzwalder
Paul Schwarzwalder
Jeremy Williams

We used these free packages from the Unity Asset Store

Sleek Toon Bot
Newton VR
Free! - Basement package
Unity Standard Assets (First Person Character Controller)

See the code on Github
